website_summaries.verdict: A highly rated and precision-engineered MacBook keyboard skin with superior transparency and extraordinary thinness that won't interfere with typing.
pros: Cleans with mild soap and warm water
Easy to put on and take off
Despite how thin it is, it holds up well
Provides some noise reduction while typing
While there are adhesive strips included, many users find the cover stays in place without them
cons: Can slip out of place and have to be repositioned if typing fast
May come off when the laptop is opened

customer_reviews.title: Prevents MacBook Pro from properly cooling.
customer_reviews.text: Although this cover will protect yo ur keyboard it will also prevent your MacBook Pro from properly cooling as much heat is dissipated through the keyboard. You will find the fan running much more. This may cause eventual failure of components. This is like putting a blanket over your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: flyijohn

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest, thinnest keyboard cover I've found for the MBP 13" with Touchbar. Lays flat and does not interfere (touch) the screen when the laptop is closed. Material feels very high quality. I didn't need to use the supplied adhesive strips. Any keyboard cover will alter typing feel a bit, but the effect is minimal in this case.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.P.

customer_reviews.title: THIS is the keyboard cover you've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: When I got my new MacBook Pro, I purchased a silicone keyboard cover from another company but hated it. It was not very clear, and looked like a latex condom stretched over the keyboard. I decided to try this product from UPPERCASE, and it's exactly what I was looking for. It's not perfectly clear, but it's more clear than the silicone product I had been using. I love the fact that the TPU is so thin--it's almost like it's not even there. I'm very pleased with this product, and would recommend it to anyone seeking a little protection for their Mac keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Ultra thin cover. Perfectly fits and adds no bulk.
customer_reviews.text: Ultra thin keyboard cover. Design doesn't interfere with your typing and fits perfectly with the MacBook Pro 15 inch 2016. The packaging was nice and the cover itself was reinforced with a plastic keyboard to ensure the cover wasn't damaged during shipping. Overall the cover is perfect. Perfectly fits the keyboard and comes with clear adhesives to keep the cover pinned on your keyboard Only con is the cover gives it a foggy clear transparent look Pictures of keyboard cover with and without adhesives. You can see the adhesive through the keyboard which doesn't bother me at all
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Roldan

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my MBP without "tape"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cover because the description stated it worked for my 2016 MBP 13". However, when I received it, there was a note in the package stating that "because Apple changed the depth of the keyboard on this model, you need to secure the cover with this tape on your keys". It looked horrible, you could see the tape through it. Yesterday, after about 3mo of having it on there, the keys started to become discolored (poopy brown) on the keys I used the most. So, I took it off. And I'll be darned if that stupid sticky tape now won't come off. I'll try to use alcohol. But, seriously. Not a great experience overall.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: and overall I like it. It fits well
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for over a month now, and overall I like it. It fits well, doesn't deform or come out of place, and I didn't even have to use the adhesive tape provided. My only complaint is that the whole purpose of buying a clear cover is pointless within a couple of weeks of use. Check the image to see the discolorations that happen with use. Also, it does make contact with your screen, so if you don't like that sort of this, this might not be the best fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: !!! NOT FOR TOUCHBAR MODEL !!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not order the product if you have a touchbar model. They claim to send you one for the touchbar. Box and labeling says it but the product inside is meant for the models with the Function keys. Purchased twice and had to return both times. Regardless, the product is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: This cover does not last
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this cover initially. It is very thin and almost invisible. Sadly, it might be too thin because it began to get holes after just a couple months of normal use. I contacted the seller, but they said the holes looked like "stapler holes".
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover so far.
customer_reviews.text: It's super thin and the way I type which is fairly fast, the thing doesn't even budge. I haven't had to use the provided stickies to hold it n place and it's even not the easiest for me to remove so that means it's very secure. I recommend this to keep your keys from wearing out and looking very shiny after a lot of usage. It doesn't affect cooling, these computers don't cool from the keyboard but rather the rear fan exhaust, anyone telling you otherwise is full of it. I'll update after a long usage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike / Naye

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Very inconspicuous and gives me peace of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very inconspicuous and gives me peace of mind that I am protecting my computer after a tragic coffee spill onto the keyboard of my old laptop. The optional stickers seemed nice as this does slide a bit with heavy typing, but I actually found them a major eyesore and very annoying because they prevented me from being able to pick the cover up regularly and clean under it. Unfortunately, removing the stickers was super challenging and required needle nose tweezers, and there is still some residual stickiness on the cover. Regardless, great purchase, and I know the stickers are marketed as optional, so I don't blame the keyboard cover for this :)
customer_reviews.author: inquisitiveone

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fits seamlessly atop my keyboard, I do not feel it when typing. As far as "adhesion" I would not say this sticks to the keys, it's simply fitted to lay over them. This makes removal as easy as taking it off. The last time I got a keyboard cover I did not realize I was supposed to take it off periodically and wash the cover. oops. This time I'll be more careful. The product helpfully includes instructions for washing. Dish soap is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kumari

customer_reviews.title: Good, but does touch the screen when closed.
customer_reviews.text: This has a good fit and works as advertised. The only problem is that, since it makes the keyboard a little higher, that is high enough for the keyboard protector to touch the screen when the MacBook is closed. Since the top of the surface of the keyboard protector accumulates skin oil and dirt, that oil and dirt now gets on the screen, forming a dirt/oil pattern with an outline of the keys. I cannot blame the keyboard protector for this, though, but rather the tight tolerance of the MacBook Pro, leaving almost no space between the keyboard and the display when the cover is closed, hence the five-star rating above, even though I am dissatisfied about this.
customer_reviews.author: Garth D. Wiebe

customer_reviews.title: Leaves noticeable key marks on screen
customer_reviews.text: After just a month there are very noticeable marks on the screen of my 2018 MacBook Pro. The product fits just fine but I cannot recommend it because of what it does to the screen. It looks awful and I hope they aren't permanently stuck. It also isn't very clear plastic. The keys look extremely washed out rather than the nice black they are supposed to look like.
customer_reviews.author: A. M

customer_reviews.title: So Ghost it doesn't exist.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to protect my work Mac Pro. When I opened the product all I found was a stiff plastic cover, no instructions, but a label telling me to separate cover from plastic base. Good luck with that. After two hours I've given up trying to separate without destroying! Maybe there were instructions missing? In my 17+ years as an Amazon prime member this will be my third product return and this is probably the second 1 star rating I've ever given a product. I usually purchase removable silicone covers for my keyboards (and have never had a problem) - I should have done the same this time.
customer_reviews.author: km WNY

customer_reviews.title: Finally a cover that fits and stays fit!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of those old silicone cover that stretched within weeks and would no longer fit my screen, leading me to have issues typing with it on. I've now had this GhostCover for several months, and it has not stretched at all! Still fits the keys perfectly, and is very thin, so it doesn't feel much different from the original keys. I didn't use the stickers to adhere it to the keyboard so that I could clean the GhostCover whenever I needed. Easy to remove and dust the actual keyboard, not that it was needed much because the GhostCover keeps it pretty clean underneath.
customer_reviews.author: ladyblack

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for smudges on screen.
customer_reviews.text: I hoped this would be thin enough to not touch the screen and leave residue. It does, but it's not actually scratching the screen, as it comes off easily with cleaner. Also, the tactile sensation of course is differnet. I find I make more typing mistakes than without the skin, but perhaps that just means I need more time with it. Other than that, it's been great. Already saved me from getting junk in my keyboard. Until Apple fixes the butterfly keyboard (supposedly done on the 16" MBP), this is a great option to keep the keyboard from needing service.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I got this because it has good reviews. I received it in the mail and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it has good reviews. I received it in the mail and put it on right away but, I can't stand this product. It always slips off. When I open my Mac its not even on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Reliable cover
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these covers for a previous computer and decided to buy from the same brand when I bought my new Macbook Pro. My experience with cheaper covers were always negative due to them sliding and bunching at the slightest movement. On both occasions when buying this brand, i have been very satisfied with how well they sit on the keyboard and allow me to fully use the keyboard without feeling the awkwardness I've felt when using other brands. I have not used the included adhesive strips, as I don't think they're necessary. I highly recommend this brand's keyboard protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Earls

customer_reviews.title: Works well but falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: It fits the keyboard perfectly and keeps the keys clean, and that's what I wanted it to do. So from that standpoint, it was a great purchase. It doesn't adhere on its own, so it has a tendency to fall off when I'm carrying my laptop while having it open. It also sometimes comes off when I'm trying to blow things off of my keyboard- the whole protector just blows right off. I bought this item twice because the first time I lost it while carrying my laptop slightly open and pointed down. So I like it enough to keep using it even though it's not the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: AsianSwan

customer_reviews.title: A+ Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, fits perfectly. Highly recommended! However, I do not recommend that you leave it on with the lid closed, it will leave little key print smudges on your screen over time. I have a little paper slot area in my laptop bag that I place it in when I pack my laptop away or when I'm using it connected to my external keyboard/monitor. Bought multiple — work, home, laptop bag... yes, that would be eliminated if bought one and left it on all the time, but NO KEY SMUDGES ON MY SCREEN! I have spoken. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: this is best keyboard cover I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Since my first laptop purchase, over ten years ago, I have always used a keyboard cover. A cover keeps a lot of crud from getting inside my machine, right?! So, after, at least five keyboard covers, I have to say this is the best one I have had so far. I don't get why people don't all use keyboard covers. This cover is extra great because it stays on the keys. It was genius to not have this cover cover the top F-function keys. Omitting this line of keyboard cover allows the rest of the cover to adhere soundly to the keyboard. I love this keyboard cover and it is the first one I have 'loved'.
customer_reviews.author: LifeIsGood

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my 2019 Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it will be said that I should have matched the model number, but this wasn't even close to fitting my new Macbook Pro. The quality and material wasn't as expected either. I ordered a case for the computer from another manufacturer, and it came with a keyboard cover which fit beautifully. Not to mention it also was color coordinated. I would suggest you pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and feels fairly natural
customer_reviews.text: Well, look at the amount of reviews... they speak for themselves. Seriously, this is a solid product if you are looking to add a little protection to your keyboard. I honestly didn't want keyboard protection, but I use beard balm daily and it can affect the keyboard wearing off (finger oils). It fits great. I don't have any issues with the keyboard cover making contact with the screen. The cover stays in place without having to use the included adhesive because there is such a precise fit. However, I do recommend screen protection as the anti-glare coating scratches very easily on ALL MacBooks... just a design flaw in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Saint04

customer_reviews.title: Excellent accessory for 2017 15" MBP
customer_reviews.text: I own the 15" 2017 MBP with the infamous butterfly keyboard. Not only can the keys easily jam, but they can easily become dirty looking after a short period of typing. I should also point out that I am typically a 'no case' person with my tech, but adding this keyboard cover has actually improved the typing experience on my keyboard. It's super thin and fits perfectly and I think the opaque grey color looks cool with my space grey MBP. I should point out to make sure you're buying the right keyboard cover as there is a different design with newer Touch Bar MBP models as they changed the arrow keys and added an escape button
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sharayko

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to, but can be annoying to use.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it's supposed to. Now with that said, the cover itself is for some reason slightly larger than the actual keys. What that means for usability is that the cover will rise and move around ever so slightly as you type. The product comes with some adhesive stickers to prevent this, however, I have not tried them out as I'm wary about slapping sticky things on my shiny new laptop. Just be advised that you will most likely have to use them if you find the movement of the cover to be as annoying as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this cover
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, and it preserves the feel of the MacBook Pro keyboard. You can feel a very slight "plasticky" feel and some cushioning from this vinyl film when typing, but honestly it is very tolerable and I don't think one could do better. It comes with some adhesive stickers to help hold the cover onto the keys. Mine would not stick to the keys at all (you presumably have to clean the keys before applying the stickers). But I feel they are not needed. The cover fits the keys very snugly, and it does not come loose. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: MarcoliTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but be aware...
customer_reviews.text: This case is is transparent and ultra thin. It has a great feel to it and doesn't mess with the backlighting. Fits my 2019 MBP with Touch Bar perfectly. It does not impair my typing at all. I do however see an issue with it potentially overheating the computer because the keyboard is an important part of cooling. If it does I will update this review and let y'all know. Also for people who care a lot about the aesthetics of their computer, it does make the keyboard appear a little grey in color but that's not a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Near-invisible protection!  And quieter too
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my new, "mid-2017" 15-inch MacBook Pro. Like others here, I have not needed to use the little pieces of stickum tape. It's really precision-crafted and fits flawlessly. It also seems to quiet the clacky butterfly switches a bit! With this in place, they make a nicely damped thumping sound. I'm happy. UPDATE: Just thought of something. This latest (2016/2017/2018) MacBook Pro generation has a reputation for unreliable keywords. In fact, Apple just announced an extended warranty. What actually happens is that tiny bits of debris get into the key mechanisms, which are exquisitely engineered and miniaturized... to the point that small pieces of dust can cause the keys to malfunction. This keyboard cover should really help that!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: Looks terrible after a couple of months and I take VERY good care of my things!
customer_reviews.author: beeba

customer_reviews.title: Already so much better than my previous cover
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a case that came with a keyboard cover, so I tried it out. I really liked having a cover, but the one it came with was super thick and ugly and always slipping around. It was a hard choice to pay the price for this cover, but I'm already so happy. It fits beautifully, without the adhesive, and looks fantastic. I haven't had it slip at all after many hours of use. It dulls the look of the keys just slightly down to a sort of matte appearance, but I like it and it does not block the backlight. Highly, highly recommended and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Heskin

customer_reviews.title: A very good keyboard cover.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this due to the fact that I got tired greasy looking keys on my macbook. This cover does the trick. It pretty much just sits on top. No adhesive or anything is needed, though it does come with some adhesive pads if needed. I have big hands and type pretty fast. It never moves. I tested whether it would fall off easily by tilting the mac. I had to tilt it almost 90 degree to get the cover to fall off. If I have anything bad to say it's that you can clearly see it on the keyboard as the keys look cloudy instead of black, but that is me finding something to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: N. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Makes MacBook Pro keyboard quieter. Thank goodness.
customer_reviews.text: I love the new MacBook Pro keyboard for a lot of reasons: the keys are the right size, there's a nice amount of travel and (after a short while) I'm beginning to find the touch bar really useful. The one thing that annoys me about it, though, is how ridiculously loud it is. For the sake of my officemates, people sitting next to me on a plane, and my own sanity, I bought this to dampen the sound. It does that really well. I guess it also keep grease and things off the keys, but that's not really my priority. It dampens sound without changing the feel of the keys too much, which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Colon

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, adhesive strips optional
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. They provided some double sided clear adhesive strips to anchor the cover, since the new keyboards are very flat. However, it detracts from the appearance. The cover stays on pretty well by itself and won't be displaced by typing. If you blow on the keyboard or invert your computer it will (understandably) fall off. *EDIT: They adhesive strips come off the keys clean so far!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Gamble

customer_reviews.title: this is the type of key protector you want versus silicone.
customer_reviews.text: this is the only kind you want. This is not silicone so it doesn’t have that tacky sticky feel, this is slick like an actual key and reduces the clicking sound from my MacBook Pro seven teen so much. this is a 100% perfect fit so once you get it on there, you’re not going to notice it’s there. It’s amazing how much it reduces the sound from the keys. This is the second one I bought, and if I lost this one, I would buy another. It doesn’t come off easy, I just forgot to take it off when sending my MacBook in for repair.
customer_reviews.author: Pch Enterprises IncTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: UPPERCASE.- you are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have found that all of the MacBook protection products made by Uppercase have been spot-on perfect. I have protectors on the trackpad, the hand rests, the touch bar, and I finally decided to try one for the keyboard. The ease of application was amazing. The cover just slipped over the keys - it isn't sticky like I was expecting and you can barely tell there's anything there at all. And I was expecting that it was going to be thick and annoying to get used to, but again, I can barely tell the difference. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the flimsy silicon key covers
customer_reviews.text: This key cover is perfectly formed to stay in place on the keys while in use, but easily removed to blow off or wipe away any dust. I've used the other kinds for about two years now and it was a constant fight to keep them in place. I've been using this one for about two weeks and I can already tell you I'll buy a few more to have on hand for if/when this needs replacing--because I can't imagine there being a better design. Bonus: it actually feels like the keys when you're working with your system so you type faster and more accurately than with the other options out there. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caldera Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great keys cover - not stretcy
customer_reviews.text: I have used other products, the UPPERCASE GhostCover, however, blows away the others. Other styles are rubbery and stretchy and after a while deform over the keys that you use the most. This cover doesn't even feel like I have a cover on the keys. It comes with adhesive to help it stay attached. I have not needed to even use this included extra. The overlay fits tightly to the formation of all the keys and just stays put. I am seriously thinking of getting the touch pad cover and the product that protects the screen from the keys while the MacBook is folded. I am very impressed and totally recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Freeindeed

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard protection!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me! I have a horrible habit of eating while I am on the computer, and since I have failed to improve my habits, this at least gives my poor MacBook a level of protection from stray crumbs. It is very easy indeed to install, and will be easy to remove and clean if that becomes necessary. If one's typing habits require this, they have included some easy to install glue dots to gently adhere the cover to the keys. I do not seem to need this, but I can see that more vigorous typers might benefit. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: CissaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great protector to keep crumbs and little keyboard nasties at bay!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard protector has exceeded my expectations. It fits the keyboard PERFECTLY....it couldn’t fit it any better. I can’t feel it when typing, even when I am working quickly, it doesn’t bubble up or move. The only thing I could complain about (but it doesn’t really bother me) is that when I open the computer, sometimes the static cling has caused the protector to be stuck (just static) to the screen. It won’t hurt anything but it does happen.
customer_reviews.author: khodge

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I think getting this keyboard protector was the best decision I made in terms of keeping my MBP "nice and clean". It's practically invisible and protects well against all the dirt that potentially could get under the keys. I love it. Adhesion is not super-mega-ultra strong -- if you like to carry your laptop vertically in semi-open state - it will fall off -- but is good enough. I haven't cleaned it with anything water-based but did use alcohol once or twice -- it worked perfectly fine. I didn't expect to be excited about this purchase but I am. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the peace of mind to protect the keyboard - and I hardly notice it's there anymore.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a perfectly snug fit that stays in place 100% of the time, but it does fit well, and generally stays put. It's definitely worth the money for the peace of mind that the keyboard is protected. I've used it a couple weeks now, and it doesn't move around while typing - I hardly notice it's there. It doesn't extend beyond the keyboard indention, which is nice, so there is no coverage of the touch pad or touch bar. They included some velcro pieces to secure it more, but I prefer the clean look without that, and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great protector
customer_reviews.text: This protector is excellent and for the most part stays put (and if it starts sliding or flips a bit - just follow the original instructions and you're good to go again). This feels great on the fingertips and there will be times when you look at the keyboard and think it came off - but then will realize it's still there doing its job and protecting those opening between the keys to prolong the life of your Macbook.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Lies Flat
customer_reviews.text: I've bought countless keyboard skins before, and invariably they pucker after just a few days of use. This is the first I've encountered that doesn't! It's thin enough to be responsive to type on, yet it also holds its shape and lies flat. According to the product description, that's because this isn't silicone, but something they call TPU, whatever that is. Okay, so it's not got some fancy design on it to make your keyboard more interesting (it's just clear), but it works better than those pretty ones. It perfectly fits my 15" 2018 MacBook Pro with Touch Bar.
customer_reviews.author: VNA

customer_reviews.title: Apple Recommends Not Covering the Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a few weeks but the product seems well made. It is ultra-thin and rests perfectly on top of the keys. Despite being super thin, it still leaves an impression on the screen when you close the laptop. Furthermore, after buying this I read an article published in January 2018 on Apple's web site entitled "Keep your Mac notebook within acceptable operating temperatures" that states not to put anything over the keyboard. It would be useful to know if the company has done any testing to see if their keyboard cover led to increased operating temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Good Protective Solution for newer Mac laptops
customer_reviews.text: These keyboards are so different and worrisome with the high failure rates. I have a 2016 15” with TouchBar and while it’s been fine thus far, and Apple has warranties the keyboard for 4 years after receiving the laptop, this skin cover makes me feel a bit more at ease. It adds a thin layer of protection. It has a perfect fit. I did not use the adhesive to attach it to the keyboard and it does not move. So far so good. Highly recommended for folks that are a bit worried about the durability of their keyboards or if they happen to snack on things that produce a bunch of crumbs near their computers.
customer_reviews.author: morgrar

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for a better keyboard protector cover
customer_reviews.text: How they mold this to fit so perfectly is beyond me. I think the typing feels BETTER with his on. Dampens the noise of my nails clacking away on keys. Once a day I remove and wash with warm water and dish soap in the kitchen and dry off with a kitchen towel. Fresh and new every day! Also much less oil build up on screen as a result. I considered removing this every time I closed the laptop and stowing in a sleeve but too tedious. By washing frequently am noticing screen cleaning needs has gone way down.
customer_reviews.author: Earl E. Bird

customer_reviews.title: but even better, it really turns down the noise made by ...
customer_reviews.text: To all latest generation MacBook users, I am totally surprised at how much improvement this makes to the clickity clack of the butterfly switch keyboard. This skin is so thin it does not hinder the use of the keyboard in any way. Moreover, it actually improves the feel of the keystrokes by simulating more travel on the keys, but even better, it really turns down the noise made by the butterfly key switches. Best of all, the GhowstCover fits like a second skin and will prevent any invasion of dust, crumbs, and liquid. This is the cheapest insurance you can buy for your Mac and with the high failure rate Apple is experiencing this will help to avoid that.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska_Haze

customer_reviews.title: Leaves smudges on your screen if left on with screen closed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over a year to help counteract apple’s butterfly key problem of getting stuff stuck underneath the keys and the key stops functioning. It definitely helps with that. HOWEVER this cover also leaves a lot of smudges on the screen if you close your laptop with the cover still on because it is ever so slightly too tall. I was resigned to think this was a problem I could never avoid but I just got a new cover from another company which works just as well as this one WITHOUT the smudge problem. Would not purchase this one again
customer_reviews.author: Dee Way

customer_reviews.title: was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly skeptical when researching, but I'm happy to say it's been a fine buy. I asked if it was compatible with the latest 2019 MBP and got a pretty quick reply assuring me it'd be fine. Arrived in the mail on a pretty warm day and was worried that maybe the cover would have deformed or something like some of the reviews claim. No problem. Perfectly fine. Fits on the keyboard like a glove. Better than a glove. I was then worried it might not fair well with the computer lid closed. So far so good after a week.
customer_reviews.author: sokokyu

customer_reviews.title: KeyBoard Protection
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product, after using it the color of the cover is changing to light yellow and it is making the MacBook Pro look very old. I would suggest getting a keyword cover with color or any design. The only good thing about this cover is that it fits the MacBook Pro 2018 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Anshul Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to like this but its gets so dirty and smudgy. then also this slips off all the time off the keyboard. Sadly I can't return it now but I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Perez

customer_reviews.title: Functions, but gets permanently dirty within a week and looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: I like how this cover is very low profile and not tacky like other covers, but I hate how disgusting this cover gets very quickly, as in, within a week of moderate use. The keys look like old chocolate with a white film on them. It cleans easier than the tacky silicon covers, but it does not get clean, so that clear cover to see your nice black keys makes your keys look murky moldy. The cover discoloration is permanent. Not good. Such a shame, because the cover stays on well, functions well, and doesn't mark the screen. It just make your keys look like crap.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Brow

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic...But Loses Shape Within a Few Months
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard cover right out of the box. It fits like a glove, and you can barely feel it as you type—let alone see it. However, after three months it is losing that initial feel. This is my second cover—I used the first for years, and I don't know why; by the time it was 9 months old it was a wreck. For the price, I will definitely purchase again, but I wish it kept it structural integrity a bit better. I guess that's the price you pay for the thinness of the cover. Can't have it all.
customer_reviews.author: Light Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it does leave a print on my screen everyday. (See photos) It actually doesn’t bother me much BUT this has to be noted for all of those who may in fact hate that. I don’t use the adhesive, and the keyboard stays on. It’s only slips when I’m typing up a storm or being probably... aggressive? Not sure. But it doesn’t happen all the time. I do recommend this, especially if you have a screen protector on. (See photos)
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't even tell this thing was on the keyboard. My boyfriend started using my MacBook, I asked him if he noticed something different about the device, he had no idea what I was talking about. I'm serious, this product is worth every penny! Update: sometimes the Space button gets stuck and I have to remove the cover to be able to use the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: juliana

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Just got a 2018 MacBook Pro, and I don't want to run into any of the keyboard issues that people have been experiencing with the last 3 models. So picked up this keyboard cover, and I am glad I did. You can use the keyboard cover with the included adhesive or without. I used adhesive just to be on the safe side. The cover is thick enough to protect the keys, and thin enough to not make typing feel terrible. And I can still see my backlight pretty good through cover as well. I also purchased palm rest protectors from this company as well, and I am officially a fan of the company.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Keep your keyboard free of schmutz
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar product to this on my previous MacBook Pro, and that saved a lot of debris from entering the keyboard. I was definitely getting one again since it's a cheap insurance policy against the keyboard, especially with the issue they've had over the past couple years. This protector is super thin, and doesn't interfere with typing. Edit: I had my MBP in for repairs, forgot to take the cover off, and forget to check if it was there when the laptop was returned so I have to get a new one. I'm getting this one again because I liked the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: GhoseCover kills the game.
customer_reviews.text: No keyboard protector is perfect—as in you wouldn't even feel it's there. But the Uppercase Ghost comes FAR closer than any other option I've used: - It blends perfectly with my Space Grey MBP. - It allows ideal access to the touchbar. - It detracts about as little as possible from the keyboard feel. - It doesn't oooooze stuff that gets all over the screen (and keys) like my other protectors did. - And since it doesn't touch the screen, it doesn't affect closure. I doubt you can find more user-friendly protection than this, and for $13, the Uppercase is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: pk opines

customer_reviews.title: Good cover, fits nice, feels nice. MacBook Pro (15-inch, 2017)
customer_reviews.text: Using this on my MacBook Pro (15-inch, 2017) and it feels pretty good. Ive only been using it a few hours, but I dont have any issues typing, or with how it just sits on the keys. Hoping this helps with longevity of the keyboard, and I just retired my 2011 macbook pro for this one, and the keys are the only things that are showing any signs of use. I will purchase a few more to keep on hand and change out periodically. Some people seem to have issues with the cover popping up on them, I have been using it for a few hours and havent had this happen once yet,
customer_reviews.author: F. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: I have a loose key and this cover is enough to help hold it in place! I also feel much better knowing that dirt/grime isn't getting underneath the keys. I did have to replace my cover after a few months, but that's a good idea for hygiene anyway. I tried cleaning the original one but didn't have a ton of luck. Also tried a "generic" of this and didn't like it nearly as much!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: You shouldn't need to buy a keyboard cover, but you need this to make your laptop usable.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 2016+ MacBook, you need one of these. Without getting too deep into the flaws of this generation of MacBook, the butterfly keyboard really tends to "jam up" with exposure any degree of dust. Keys just stop working on the regular. I really should not have to buy a keyboard cover for my laptop, but it was the easiest way to fix one of the many blatant shortcomings of the MacBook butterfly keyboard. The cover works perfectly! I can barely tell its there. In fact, it almost makes the butterfly keyboard feel more tactile. This is the keyboard cover to get, since Apple unfortunately designed a product that requires a cover to fix their mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: Far Superior to Silicone
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of the standard silicone type keyboard covers and they all stretch out, and the softness of the material allows oils to build up on the surface which then comes off on the screen when the lid is closed. This UPPERCASE design and material is superior in every way; I'll never go back. The tactile feedback of the keys is excellent and the fit is perfect. It doesn't feel like I've got anything over the keyboard so typing feels natural and requires no additional force required (unlike silicone covers). I don't think it's possible to find a product with a better fit. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: T. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, washable, and can save your computers LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, simple and easy to use. Came with little sticky tabs to help hold it in place on the keyboard. I like that I can take it off and clean it. A few years ago I had spilled beer on my 13" MacBook Pro and it damn near killed the computer. Fortunately I had one of these little guys on it and it saved my computers life. Now of course I have the apple care, but I take no chances, and the new keyboard doesn't have as much travel on the keys so you don't even notice this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Childs

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect much but it exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: When I was ordering this, I thought it's your typical run of the mill keyboard protectors. So when it arrived, I was surprised because the box is too thin. When I opened the package, the protector was really very thin. It fits my Macbook Pro 13" keyboard and I didn't even need the adhesive that it came in because it really didn't affect my typing that much. It gives good coverage for my keyboard and you wouldn't even notice it's there if you're not aware of it. This is a 100% must-have for any Macbook users, especially with the delicate keyboard that Apple decided to use on their new models.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard cover to keep my keyboard on my new MacBook Pro clean. I absolutely love it! It has a great durable feeling to it and it's not as sticky as other silicone keyboard covers. It does come with small adhesive stickers if you want to secure the cover but I have it on without the stickers and it works perfectly fine. I'm glad I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Worked great so far
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover for my 2019 MBP 13". It quiets the keys (with the new keyboard system I have to press harder for them to.. connect and this dampens the noise). Haven't had to clean it yet as brand new. No need for adhesion yet either. Fits perfectly. Would recommend. Update: three months later and still perfect condition. Not a single key has stretched out of place and all edges smooth. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Ultra thin Keyboard Protector
customer_reviews.text: I have always used keyboard protectors on my laptops. This one is ultra thin and clings well to the keyboard. A keyboard protector came with the laptop cover I ordered, however it kept the top of my MacBook raised and it would not shut securely. This keyboard cover presents no problems. I am very happy with this product and, even though it is a bit more expensive that some others, I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Redtag

customer_reviews.title: Interferes with my typing
customer_reviews.text: I really need this because I've already had a laptop ruined by my kids spilling a whole cup of coffee on it and I'm the queen of crumbs between my keys, so I will keep it on my keyboard BUT it interferes with my typing. When I hit just the edge of a key, it won't press down all the way so I have often have to go back and fix typos and cannot write as smoothly and quickly as this keyboard would let me without the cover.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: It does not stick to the keyboard at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have the 2019 MacBook pro that came out July 2019. I wanted a keyboard cover the will stick well and not stick to the screen every time I open it. This one always falls off and is made out of cheap plastic cover. The seller spent more money on the packaging than on the actual product. For 15 dollars after tax, it seems like a ripoff. I am only giving it two stars because it is easy to clean and the packing is good. it is more of a 1.5/5
customer_reviews.author: MIchael W.

customer_reviews.title: ... that I have used that makes the keys feel like the real keys without sticky plastic covering
customer_reviews.text: This is the first keyboard cover protector that I have used that makes the keys feel like the real keys without sticky plastic covering. It also protects the sensitive keys from pet fur or dust that can make the keys not operate well. I had to have a key fixed on my MacBook for that reason as it has the Butterfly Keyboard. I got this cover for that computer too after they fixed my key and said there was a cat hair under it. I love this keyboard cover and highly recommend it. It is different from any I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Newer Mac perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is my second keyboard cover with Uppercase, last one I purchased over a year ago and only had to replace it as I left it in my lap top bag and it got super creased, I bought a new one and int he mean time put the old one back on until the new one arrived and It's back to normal! Really great product and works so well with the mac book with touch bar, I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Welshie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent keyboard cover! - keeps dust and cat hair from getting under keys - does not feel sticky or tacky - thin and does not lift off when typing - easy to remove and clean (comes with adhesive strips which I did not use) - I noticed some comments about ventilation issues, I think it gets hot regardless of the keyboard cover so I end up elevating the laptop with an eraser and sitting in front of a fan. After I had to get my previous laptop professionally cleaned I highly recommend getting this keyboard cover, especially if you're thinking about getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for a really horrible keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I hate the keyboard and especially the trackpad on the 2017 MacBook Pro. No matter how careful I am the computer keeps doing stuff I had no intention of doing. Even after turning off all of those stupid "gestures" weird stuff keeps happening. The biggest problem is the oversized trackpad. It takes up so much space that it is hard to avoid touching it. You have to pick your hands up in the air and not rest any part of your hands. So I avoid the keyboard and use an external Kinesis keyboard and a Kensington trackball instead. This GhostCover does an excellent job of keeping the terrible keyboard clean.
customer_reviews.author: Furba Volpe

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard Protector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It does not move around while I am typing, closing, or opening my MacBook. Yet it easily lifts to shake off dust. I didn't use a keyboard protector on my last MacBook and that is what finally killed it -- all the dust and debris getting down under the keys. I would buy this again in an instant!
customer_reviews.author: Duke Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly fits my keyboard. Don't think twice. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Finally. A keyboard that fits PERFECTLY. It even comes with double-sided stickers in case the plastic keyboard lifts from certain areas. This extra effort they have made gave me a peace of mind with issues from previous keyboard covers that lifted up at certain keys. I seriously have had no issues with this. The funny thing was, I had no intentions in purchasing this product due to poor experiences in the past. I ended up returning the anti-glare screen protector purchased with this keyboard cover and kept this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tria

customer_reviews.title: Better than other models
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a recent model Apple laptop knows they made their keyboards cheaper, and any crumb or dust bit can make them stop working. They're changing the way they make them now. But for those of us with these models, a keyboard cover is the only solution. My 1st was colored, but the letters wore off within a week. My 2nd was clear, but soon stretched too big to fit and started slipping off during use. THIS ONE IS BETTER! It's a bit stiffer and stays on better and seems like it might not have that stretching issue, though time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Morticia

customer_reviews.title: it is still smart to try to avoid them failing when you really ...
customer_reviews.text: a must for current MBP! Although now Apple is willing to fix these keyboards if they stop working, it is still smart to try to avoid them failing when you really need them to work. This will keep out most all dust and crumbs. It is very thin and you barely notice it. I tried a number of colored skins on my old macbook and never lasted more than 1 hour of use before pulling them off. I have no desire to take this off. In fact I prefer it on as it make the keyboard quieter and it gives it a cool matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Indygreg

customer_reviews.title: No adhesion
customer_reviews.text: It should have been a clue when the gummy dots and strips came with the cover. Worst of it - cost nearly twice as much as the one that works. With my old arthritic hands, the dots and strips just fell to the desk or the floor and even after chasing them down and placing them, no help. The cover continued to slide. If I could use it, it would be easy to clean. And it removed itself.
customer_reviews.author: Judy E. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep that sensitive keyboard covered!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised at how thing this thing is. The new Macbooks have thin keyboards (which has it's cons) but this cover is thin enough to not get in the way of typing and closing the lid. I've been using it for 2 weeks now at events and bars. I can say it has keep things cea It's sad that we have to purchase covers for these expensive laptops (i've had my keyboard replaced because of keys that double tap) but this product does a good job keeping my keyboard clean.
customer_reviews.author: cfaviles

customer_reviews.title: Better than MacAlly and Mosiso
customer_reviews.text: This is so good, it locks in place, can't be seen, has just enough texture that it feels better than the bare keys. I wish it had some good colors, but functionality wins. I've tried two others and they didn't work well. The MacAlly was more plastic like this one, but didn't fit as well and kept moving around - a slight finger swipe would dislodge it. The Mosiso adhered better and was prettier, but would bow up in parts and I have to smooth it down all the time.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Sawers

customer_reviews.title: Nice solution. Takes a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this for about 3 weeks. So far it's pretty good. Takes some getting used to. Keys are quieter, keeps dust out of the keys which all 16+ Pro users know is a big deal. Probably will buy another one when it wears out. I am a heavy typer (network engineer always working) and it's standing up well so far. I did not use the sticky tape. It stays in place pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I hate keyboard covers
customer_reviews.text: I hate keyboard covers. But this cover is good for what it is. You can barely feel it and it fits the keyboard really well. If you need / want this protection (and for the times I've spilled coffee on my keyboards) this cover will do good job in protecting from spills. Or if your bringing your mbp into a dusty dirty environment, this is worth having. I won't return it as it's good at for what it is and is very useful for those times I need it. I just don't use it everyday as it wouldn't be comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally my machine's keyboard is better than the last
customer_reviews.text: Have had problems (mainly noise and not as soft as previous versions) with the new macbook butterfly keyboard since inception. Most recently found an article online that apple would potentially address it or fix the loud butterfly keyboard issue. After seeing another Genius, I found the solution on my own. Apple will not comment on the noise and negative feedback. Finally my machine's keyboard is better than the last. $13 solution...Genius, why didn't I think of that. Perfect fit for MacBook Pro (15-Inch, 2016)
customer_reviews.author: Albin

customer_reviews.title: Left marks on screen
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to protect the keyboard on my son's new MacBook Pro, especially to keep it clean. I liked the way this looked and felt and it did seem to do it's job. Unfortunately it also left marks on the laptop screen when it was closed. This happened pretty soon after we started using it so we returned it. I can't say if the marks would end up permanently on the screen as we stopped using it as soon as we noticed them.
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: then this is the best one in the market
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy if for the looks, or if the expectations are that this should last the lifetime of your donglebook (pro), it won't. But if your expectations are to protect the poorly designed keyboard of your donglebook from dirt, then this is the best one in the market. This perfectly blends to the keyboard and the material seems to be good. With normal use, this will last a few months. Ensure there's no oil/dirt on keyboard before put it on else parts of the cover will stick to the keyboard and will not look good, something like the picture in beeba's review.
customer_reviews.author: Venadt

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive marketing
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like companies that mislead you with photos. I looked through them saw the skins that appeared to come with the keyboard cover to only then receive the keyboard cover and nothing else. So then I’m running to look at the add and go back through the pictures only to find in the fine print not included. Then why the heck are you even showing it.
customer_reviews.author: JDM_Whore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Used other covers before but they all failed me. This has been the best cover I've used, it stays put with the provided tape and is of good quality. It fits perfectly over my keys and is super easy to clean. Have not had a reason to remove it so not sure about that. Just make sure you buy the right one for your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Does provide good protection, but the cover will not stay on your keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of great reviews. However, I ran into problems where the cover will not stay on the keyboard. It lifts very easily, and it feels that it's not providing enough tight fit for it to stay still on my macbook pro keyboard. UPDATE**** I'm not sure if I received a defected one, because my friend's cover seem to fit perfectly while mine is fitted so loosely
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect keyboard cover for the MacBook Pro. It's so thin such that I nearly returned a defective MacPro with the cover on it ! I have had a number of these over the years for various MacBook Pros. This is my favorite keyboard cover. I have found others to be too thick. The only issue I've had with these is discoloration, but that's a minor issue. It covers my keyboard, and doesn't interfere with my keyboarding, IN fact, I've come to prefer keyboarding with the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: DJS

customer_reviews.title: I hardly know it's there!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is wonderful! I've had the flimsy covers in the past, but with a new computer, I wanted to spend a little more and get something that might be less frustrating. This fits so well I'm not always certain it is on there. I opened it, and set it on the keyboard and it fits perfectly. It also makes the keys a little less slippery. I was afraid it would slide off a lot, so was glad it included the tapes, as these keys are so set back, but I haven't actually needed the stickies.
customer_reviews.author: klvinci

customer_reviews.title: Protects but a little bit loose !
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a way to protect my keyboard keys from getting worn off, this product worked wonderful to serve this purpose.. The only concern i have is the protector may stick to your fingers and lift up depending on your typing speed !! Thankfully it comes with adhesives, i didn't use them tho, i was scared it would damage my laptop or leave a residue, since it was more important to have my keyboard fresh and clean, i was happy with this purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Tekino

customer_reviews.title: Thin and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use an external keyboard with my 2018 MacBook Pro, but keep the lid open all day and got this cover to keep airborne dust from settling between the keys. The keyboard on the 2018 MacBook Pro is not great, in my opinion. I though that the GhostCover would make typing worse, but it's thin and flexible enough to barely be noticeable the times I've typed directly on my MacBook Pro. A big plus is that it fits perfectly around the keys with zero play.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Hatoum

customer_reviews.title: Needed a fix for macbook keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The 2017 Macbook keyboard has never really worked for me as someone who types for long periods of time. The action on the keys is very short. And I've already had some keys go completely dead and was told it is symptomatic to this particular Macbook. I didn't want the hassle of replacing my laptop just for a new keyboard so I've tried several keyboard protectors. The Ghostcover is the second I've tried and the best so far. It really hugs the keys and makes it easier not to slide off and accidentally hit low-lying keys on the keyboard. I can type faster and with better precision like the higher action keys of older, bulkier keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Macario Studebaker

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, I loveeee it!. I got my MBP 2017 and due the keyboard issues with dust etc., I decide to add a cover, I know someones that use a bulky not very good looking cover, this is the opposite, is 1mm tick, I have not felt more difference than using the pure keyboard, besides something that I like is that the material is mate finish and my fingers do not slip (which happens if I use the plain keyboard). After 2 weeks I am very satisfied, I would like if UPPERCASE sold a cover for the touch bar.
customer_reviews.author: bwai87

customer_reviews.title: perfect cover to save you key's from spill or food particles!
customer_reviews.text: this keyboard cover is awesome! i bought this as i had spilled liquid on two of my previous laptops and i strongly felt had i had this cover on they would have survived the spill. About the cover: i don't feel my typing impacted at all because of this just that the feel is a bit different, other than that the key strokes are as smooth as they can be. i can't recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Arun Kumar

customer_reviews.title: I had one and it somehow disappeared, I never had any adhesive but it laid flat.
customer_reviews.text: worked good to protect my keyboard from dirt and spills if I ever decided to have a drink over my keyboard. it always laid flat unlike the one im using it sticks in two rows and the rest are all raised and horrible the sides folding up. I recommend this over any others ive seen on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dabloesco

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was clear
customer_reviews.text: It fits like a glove I just wish it was clear instead of frosted. There's no adhesion to the back unless I'm mistaken. It comes with a couple sticky pieces of tape "should corners lift" but the whole damn thing flies off if you move your laptop or slip your hand. ALSO, the adhesion stickers are white (see picture) so good luck making that inconspicuous. Might just used clear double sided tape in a few corners.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaWildFlower

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have a dog that sheds a lot so my number one reason for getting this keyboard cover was to prevent her hair from getting under the keys. It fits my keyboard nicely though definitely use the adhesive strips if you're a heavy typer or move your computer around a lot. I opted out of using them and haven't really had any problems with it slipping off but I am a pretty light typer. Unfortunately it does leave an imprint on my screen so it seems like I'll have to wipe my screen off more often. But since I'm not constantly pulling out dog hair from under my keys I find that a fine trade off.
customer_reviews.author: curlywavygal

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 2017 MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Just had my original keyboard replaced for free by Apple, and wanted to avoid all those tiny crumbs messing things up again. This dropped right over the keyboard and after about a minute of getting used to it, I forget it was there. Had no need for the adhesives they provided to hold it in place. Very happy I got this and wish I did it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Doug G

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.text: MacBook Pros with butterfly keyboard have a very low key travel. This thing doesn't have anything to hold onto. It moves everywhere, rendering the keyboard unusable. I ordered mine in red (it looked cool in my space gray 2017 15" MBP), but I had to get rid of it almost immediately because I couldn't type properly with it on the keyboard. It was very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Lucio M

product_meta.title: UPPERCASE GhostCover Premium Ultra Thin Keyboard Protector for MacBook Pro with Touch Bar 13" and 15" (2016 2017 2018 2019, Apple Model Number A1706, A1707, A1989, A1990, A2159)
feature_bullets: Engineered to fit precisely to the keyboard of your 2016 2017 2018 2019 Macbook Pro with Touch Bar (Apple Model Number A1706, A1707, A1989, A1990) US Keyboard Layout Only
Tested for not interfering with Touch Bar operation. This keyboard protector does NOT cover the touch bar area, and does NOT come with a Touch bar protector.
NEW! Industry Leading 0.12mm (0.005 in.) thickness to minimize typing interference.
Made with premium engineering grade TPU material (compare to our standard TPU keyboard protector)
High transparency to preserve the elegance of your Macbook, and allows keyboard backlight to shine through. Completely washable and reusable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,520 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
